name: Static password
description:
The signon-o-tron team have convinced the PM to take down the prototype, and have built the minimum viable product, a server which actually checks the password submitted now

It's running on port 4001

See if you can guess the password

Luckily, you've been able to copy the binary from the Ubuntu 16.10 Jenkins build machine, which might help.
hint: Decompiling the binary or running it in GDB might be interesting
